John McCain: s attack on Mitt Romney's position on Iraq: The expert's verdict mentions that John McCain attacked Mitt Romney on Iraq, bringing the issue to the forefront of the campaign. This attack serves as evidence of the claim that Romney wants to set a date for withdrawal.
McCain linking Romney: s position with Hillary Clinton's: In his remarks to reporters, McCain linked Romney's position on withdrawal with that of Democratic candidate Hillary Clinton. This association strengthens the claim that Romney supports setting a date for withdrawal.
Romney: s interview on Good Morning America: The expert's verdict highlights an interview Romney gave on Good Morning America in April 2007. In this interview, Romney discusses the need for timetables and milestones for withdrawal but emphasizes that they shouldn't be publicly disclosed. This interview provides further evidence of Romney's stance on withdrawal.
